original_text: He had begun his journey from Babylon on the first day of the first month, and he arrived in Jerusalem on the first day of the fifth month, for the gracious hand of his God was on him.
korean_text: 첫째 달 초하루에 바벨론에서 길을 떠났고 하나님의 선한 손의 도우심을 입어 다섯째 달 초하루에 예루살렘에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: He had begun his journey from Babylon
on the first day of the first month
on the first day of the fifth month
for the gracious hand of his God was on him
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 하나님의 은혜로운 손이 그에게 있었기 때문이다
